divs: sighting details it was at 1:10 am sunday i was taking my dogs out to pee it was a beautiful clear night, i enjoy watchimg the airplanes fly from cleveland air port. while one airliner was flying twoards detroit i notic another one flying noryh\west but on a upward angle flying the same speed as the other planes then i realized their were no flashing lighys,the ship was visable from the moon light,but i could not see the moon, but it looked like a plane fuselog but much bigger and it was a lot farther out than i have ever seen a plane fly,i realized it was leaving earyh, all of a sudden it stoped moved sidways yo the left then back to the right then to the left again, a short distance infrount of the ship a larg lihht blue circle with static electricty in it appeard, the ship flew into the circle and disapeard, this all happend in a couple of minites. i rember thinking i hope i wasent yhe onley one to witness that alsome sight. well that is what i saw and i will never forget it, randy

Summary: I SEEN A SHIP FLY NORTH/WEST AWAY FROM EARTH AND DISAPEAR INTO A LARGE LIGHT BLUE HOLE THEN DISAPEARD .
